code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';export const useLocalStorage=(key,initialValue)=>{const[storedValue,setStoredValue]=useState(()=>{try{const item=window.localStorage.getItem(key);return item?JSON.parse(item):initialValue;}catch(error){console.error(`Error reading localStorage key "${key}":`,error);return initialValue;}});const setValue=value=>{try{setStoredValue(value);window.localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(value));}catch(error){console.error(`Error setting localStorage key "${key}":`,error);}};return[storedValue,setValue];};
